text: Nordstromia unilinea is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Hong-Fu Chu and Lin-Yao Wang in 1988. It is found in Fujian, China., 2010: Nordstromia guenterriedeli sp. n. from Sumatra (Indonesia) (Lepidoptera: Drepanidae). Entomofauna 0031: 57-68. Adults can be distinguished from other species in the genus by the dark brown colour of the wings with yellow crosslines on the forewings., 1988: On the Chinese Drepaninae (Lepidoptera: Drepanidae) genus Nordstroemia Bryk, 1943. Acta Entomologica Sinica 31 (3): 309-317. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1988 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of China
title: Nordstromia unilinea
